meta.description: Character assessment interview questions with medieval RPG theming
meta.instructions: Questions are grouped by life area. Each answer contributes scores to dimension sub-facets.

categories.name: Daily Life & Routines
categories.intro: Let us begin by understanding your daily rituals, brave adventurer...

questions.text: When the dawn breaks over the kingdom, how do you typically greet the new day?

answers.text: I rise before the sun, eager to begin my training and studies
I wake at a reasonable hour, taking time to prepare mind and body
I confess... the bed holds me captive longer than I'd like

questions.text: As twilight falls upon the realm, how do you spend your evening hours?

answers.text: Lost in ancient tomes and scrolls, expanding my knowledge
In the company of friends and family, sharing tales and laughter
Practicing my craft or pursuing personal quests
Resting and recovering‚Äîthe day's battles take their toll
Gazing at enchanted screens until the midnight hour

questions.text: What manner of sustenance fuels your adventures?

categories.name: Physical Prowess

questions.text: How would you describe your nightly rest in the realm of dreams?

categories.name: Mind & Learning
categories.intro: The sharpest blade is the mind. Tell me of your intellectual pursuits...

questions.text: How often do you consult the ancient tomes and scrolls (books, articles, educational content)?

answers.text: Daily‚Äîknowledge is my greatest treasure
Regularly‚ÄîI make time for learning each week
Occasionally, when a topic catches my interest

answers.text: Studying texts and documentation‚Äîthe scholar's way
Hands-on practice‚Äîlearning by doing
Learning from masters and mentors‚Äîwisdom passed down

Teaching others‚Äîexplaining cements understanding

questions.text: When faced with a perplexing puzzle or challenge, what is your approach?

answers.text: I analyze methodically, breaking it into smaller pieces
I seek creative, unconventional solutions
I consult with allies who might have insight
I trust my instincts and dive in headfirst

questions.text: When you encounter something unknown or mysterious, what stirs within you?

answers.text: Excitement! I must investigate and understand

categories.name: Spirit & Emotion
categories.intro: The inner realm is as vast as the outer. Let us explore your spiritual depths...

questions.text: When dark clouds gather and stress threatens to overwhelm, how do you respond?

answers.text: I have rituals and practices that restore my calm
I seek the company of trusted allies for support
I push through‚Äîthere's no time for weakness
I struggle... the storms often get the better of me

questions.text: Do you commune with the stillness‚Äîthrough meditation, prayer, or quiet contemplation?

answers.text: Aye, such practice is the cornerstone of my daily ritual

I have sought the stillness, but it eludes my restless mind

questions.text: How often do you pause to count your blessings and appreciate what you have?

answers.text: Daily‚Äîgratitude is a practice I cultivate intentionally
Often‚ÄîI try to notice the good things in life

questions.text: How well do you know the storms and calms of your own heart?

answers.text: I have mastered the art of reading my soul's weather

categories.name: Relationships & Bonds
categories.intro: No hero stands alone. Tell me of your companions and connections...

questions.text: In matters of social gatherings and companionship, what is your nature?

answers.text: I thrive in the company of others‚Äîthe more, the merrier!

answers.text: Our house stands united‚Äîmy kin are the bedrock upon which I build

questions.text: What of matters of the heart‚Äîromantic bonds and partnerships?

answers.text: I am in a fulfilling partnership that strengthens us both

questions.text: How skilled are you in the art of parley and discourse with your fellow travelers?

answers.text: I wield words as a knight wields steel‚Äîwith precision and power

categories.name: Work & Prosperity
categories.intro: Gold and glory‚Äîlet us discuss your professional pursuits and material standing...

answers.text: It is my sacred calling‚Äîthe gods themselves placed me upon this path

questions.text: What heights do you aspire to climb in your chosen craft or trade?

answers.text: I shall not rest until I am master of my guild, known throughout the realm

questions.text: How would you describe your relationship with gold and resources?

answers.text: I am a prudent steward‚ÄîI save, invest, and plan ahead

questions.text: How do you divide your hours between duty to your craft and the other treasures of life?

answers.text: I have found the golden mean‚Äîwork and life exist in harmony

categories.name: Hobbies & Mastery
categories.intro: Beyond duty lies passion. What pursuits ignite your soul?

questions.text: What manner of hobbies and personal pursuits occupy your free time?

Tinkering and building‚Äîworking with hands and tools

questions.text: Are you apprenticed to any new art or craft, honing abilities yet unmastered?

categories.name: Goals & Aspirations
categories.intro: Finally, let us speak of the future you wish to forge...

questions.text: If the gods granted you a boon to strengthen one aspect of your being, where would you direct their blessing?

answers.text: My body's vigor‚Äîstrength, endurance, and the fire of life
My mind's expansion‚Äîwisdom, knowledge, and keen understanding
My spirit's serenity‚Äîpeace, balance, and emotional mastery
My bonds with others‚Äîfellowship, love, and trusted alliances

questions.text: How ready are you to embark on a journey of transformation?

answers.text: I am fully committed‚Äîlet the quest begin!
